infringement_analysis: Alleged infringement of Canadian Patent No. 1,341,196
application_details: Plaintiffs sought an interlocutory injunction in Federal Court
evidence_presented: Evidence and expert testimonies were presented regarding market impact and financial harm
decision_reasoning: While a serious issue was established, irreparable harm was not proven due to potential mitigation strategies and financial stability of the Plaintiffs
result_of_case: The motion for an interlocutory injunction is dismissed as the Plaintiffs failed to demonstrate irreparable harm
relevant_rule: Interlocutory injunctions require proving: a serious issue to be tried, irreparable harm without the injunction, and balance of convenience favoring the applicant
